Title: Mahler Symphony No. 2 - BBC Philharmonic Orchestra - Sir Charles Mackerras (RAH, 1995)
Description:
This performance was given as part of the 1995 BBC Promenade Concerts at the Royal Albert Hall, London on 15 September 1995. 

Rosa Mannion (soprano)
Jean Rigby (mezzo-soprano)

BBC Singers
Brighton Festival Chorus
Edinburgh Festival Chorus

BBC Philharmonic Orchestra
conducted by
Sir Charles Mackerras

For more details see:
https://www.bbc.co.uk/events/e8b8gw

This is part of a collection of live "off air" recordings from radio broadcasts I have made since 1970, and I have recently preserved by transferring from tape to digital format. None of the recordings is derived from a commercial release, nor are they of commercial sound quality. No payment is sought for listening to these recordings, I am sharing them in the hope that they may give pleasure to other music lovers, as they have given pleasure to me. No copyright infringement is intended, please do contact me to allow me to correct the situation should this be the case.

Title: Janáček, Mahler - Czech Philharmonic Orchestra - Sir Charles Mackerras (RAH, 1998)
Description:

0:21:01 Radio commentary
0:23:30 Janáček Taras Bulba
0:48:41 Radio commentary
0:49:05 Mahler Symphony No. 1

These performances were given as part of the 1998 season of BBC Promenade Concerts at the Royal Albert Hall, London on 7 September 1998.

Czech Philharmonic Orhestra
conducted by
Sir Charles Mackerras

Title: Mahler: Symphony No.1     C. Mackerras / Czech Phil. live at Proms 1998
Description:
Mahler: Symphony No.1 
1st movement   00:00
2nd   16:02
3rd    23:51
4th    34:23
Charles Mackerras / Czech Philharmonic orchestra
7/9/1998 London, Royal Albert Hall live recording
マーラー：交響曲第1番
チャールズ・マッケラス指揮　チェコ・フィルハーモニー管弦楽団
1998年9月7日　ロンドン、ロイヤル・アルバートホール　ライブ録音
※マッケラスのマーラーは記録は少ないけれどどれも素晴らしいものです。ここではチェコ・フィルの艶やかな弦と壮麗なブラスを生かし、美しくも厳しい名演を聴かせてくれました。

Title: Mahler: Symphony No.2 'Resurrection'      C. Mackerras / BBCPO live at Proms 1995
Description:
Mahler: Symphony No.2 'Resurrection'   
1st movement   00:00
2nd   20:48
3rd    30:37
4th    40:37
5th    46:00
Charles Mackerras / BBC Philharmonic orchestra
(Sub conductor: Sachio Fujioka)
Sop) Rosa Mannion     Alt) Jean Rigby
Cho) Brighton festival Chorus, Edinburgh festival chorus, BBC singers
15/9/1995 London, Royal Albert Hall live recording
マーラー：交響曲第2番「復活」
チャールズ・マッケラス指揮　BBCフィルハーモニー管弦楽団
ソプラノ）ローザ・マニオン　アルト）ジェーン・リグビー
合唱）ブライトン祝祭合唱団、エジンバラ祝祭合唱団、BBCシンガーズ
1995年9月15日　ロンドン、ロイヤル・アルバートホール　ライブ録音
※1995年プロムス音楽祭の掉尾を飾ったマッケラスの「復活」。大オルガンと一体になったクライマックスまでのドラマティックな展開はさすがマッケラスです。当時BBCフィルの副指揮者だった藤岡幸夫が練習指揮、および本番影オケの指揮を担当していました。
